channel.title: Help please!
channel.description: Ok so i got a server that is 562 and i want to make it so other people or freinds in the house can play so i hook up my Lan Ip which is 192.168.10.106 i hook that up in the client.java and does not work it keeps going on this connecting to the update server. and when i swith it back to 127.0.0.1 then my ip adress it works how i make it work with my lan?

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @VestaPK VestaPK
item.description:
@VestaPK wrote:

Change the IP back to 127.0.0.1 in Client.java. Go to your Client as JavaGuru stated then change the IP to whatever your No-Ip IP is. If you have Portforwarded then it should work for everyone. But the No-Ip IP don’t always work for the host, mine never works for me so I have my own version of the Client you maybe should do that before doing the stated above.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!

yea i did compile i changed and compiled then ran and was stuck at a certain part like connecting to updated server or something like that and just stays

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @JavaGuru JavaGuru™
item.description:
@JavaGuru wrote:

First.
U need to put in your ip in the client.
Compile.

If other players in your house are connected to the same internet you can log in.
If not you have to portforward.

Read full topic
